襊字的基本解释

襊
cuì
衣游缝。

襊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cuō］
［《廣韻》倉括切，入末，清。］
衣服上的褶子。

襊字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　襊； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1124第23
【唐韻】麤最切【集韻】取外切，?音?。衣游縫也。【劉孝標·樂府】裲襠雙心共一袜，袙腹兩邊作八襊。　又【韻會】麤括切，音撮。【類篇】緇布冠謂之襊。　又【玉篇】衣領也。　【直音】亦作?。

襊字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
襊字的起名意思

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Jixia] [Department of Clothing Characters] 　襊; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1124 Page 23
[Tang Yun] The rough cut is the most cut [Ji Yun] Take the outer cut, "yin". The clothes are sewn. [Liu Xiaobiao·Yuefu] There is one socks on both sides of the crotch and two hearts, and eight folds on both sides of the belly.　[Rhyme Club] It's rough and cut, and the sound is pinched. 【Classes】The cloth crown is called the sacred cloth.　[Jade articles] Also the collar.　【Straight tone】also used as?.
